name: Angry stone
description:
The mischievous little flying dragon accidentally entered the maze. Would you be willing to come and accompany him out of the maze? Xiaofeilong was originally traveling in groups, but was attracted by the maze and couldn't find an exit. It had to grit its teeth and walk forward. Use the directional keys to manipulate the Little Flying Dragon to move up, down, left, and right in the maze. Green barriers, melodious music, and adventures along the way, come and try this game!

Gameplay

You need to manipulate the character, keep moving forward, and collect coins along the way. Until you step out of the maze.
